EmailTemplate.name: Reskin Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Please approve your AZ Central Reskin
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.SA_Contact_Name__c},
Your banner ad for AZ central is currently scheduled to run on [insert date] and is ready to be approved. Please click on the link below for a preview of what your ad will look like. To run this re-skin we require an approval response within 48 hours.
Please note, we can only make factual changes to the re-skin. We appreciate your assistance and approval and look forward to promoting your ad on AZCentral.com
Click the link to view your ad:
If you have any questions about your ad or deal, please feel free to reach out to me at anytime.
Best,
Katrina
